snippet: Our lower kitchen cabinets need to be replaced due to water damage, but the upper cabinets are still in good shape. Is it O.K. to mix new and old cabinetry?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A on whether it is advisable to replace damaged lower kitchen cabinets while leaving original upper cabinets.
lead_paragraph: Our lower kitchen cabinets need to be replaced due to water damage, but the upper cabinets are still in good shape. Is it O.K. to mix new and old cabinetry?
